name: Sheraton-Residences
title: Sheraton Residences
description: Margins Developments Launches Sheraton Residences with Omar Khairat’s Captivating Performance at Abdeen Palace
subDescription: Margins Developments participated in Cityscape Global Riyadh with exclusive offers across all its projects, led by Sheraton Residences. As the first Sheraton-branded residential project in Egypt and the Middle East, this unique compound in Mostakbal City New Cairo, offers unmatched luxury and premium services. The project’s distinct features and strategic location make it a standout investment opportunity, enhancing its value in the Egyptian real estate market.
